ruleSummaries.description: The value of pdfaid:part shall be the part number of ISO 19005 to which the file conforms.

checks.errorMessage: The "part" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema is 1 instead of 2 for PDF/A-2 conforming file.

ruleSummaries.description: The document catalog dictionary shall include a MarkInfo dictionary containing an entry, Marked, whose value shall be true.

checks.errorMessage: /Marked entry of the MarkInfo dictionary is not present in the document catalog or is set to false

statement: PDF file is not compliant with Validation Profile requirements.
